Successful poster presentations

25 Oct 2017

Dear all,

Four of our current MACV members participated at II Encuentro Regional de Semilleros de Investigación which took place on october 23 at Universidad de Investigación y Desarrollo (Bucaramanga).

Three research posters were sent and favorable critics arised from the event referees.

MACV collective expresses appreciation to Escuela de Ingeniería de Sistemas e Informática for the financial aid that made possible our participation on this event.







Escuela de Ingeniería de Sistemas e Informática. at the Universidad Industrial de Santander
